name: incomeVerificationDocumentsDownload
description:
`/income/verification/documents/download` provides the ability to download the source documents associated with the verification.

If Document Income was used, the documents will be those the user provided in Link. For Payroll Income, the most recent files available
for download from the payroll provider will be available from this endpoint.

The response to `/income/verification/documents/download` is a ZIP file in binary data. If a `document_id` is passed, a single document will be contained in this file.
If not, the response will contain all documents associated with the verification.

The `request_id` is returned in the `Plaid-Request-ID` header.

document_id.description: The document ID to download. If passed, a single document will be returned in the resulting zip file, rather than all document

AccessTokenNullable.description: The access token associated with the Item data is being requested for.

APIClientID.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.
APIClientID.title: ClientID

APISecret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.
APISecret.title: APISecret
